title: Double Points in FontLab
content:
I have created a font in fontlab by tracing placed images, so the font is quite rough with lots of points. I am finishing the font and have noticed that there are lots of yellow nodes, which indicate where I have two points on top of each other. (see image)

My question is how do I get rid of these double points?

Is there an automated way of doing it, as there are lots throughout the entire font?
